column1: The build starts with the (I guess you could call it a) cockpit. After adding on a few pieces, the build travels to the legs, which are jointed in two places: the hips and the ankles. The feet are bulky compared to the legs, which I
column2: assume is to add balance to the overall build. Next come the arms, which are designed decently. The shoulders suggest armor, all while allowing for almost any pose you can think of. The hands are your usual fists, allowing for a variety of accessories to be added (I like using ninja swords for chef knives
